example.text: In 2023 , my goal is to finally hold accountable those responsible for shutting down our economy, costing unvaccinated employees their jobs , and encouraging Governor Inslee to keep our children out of school with devastating mental health consequences. It's long overdue .

By a vote of 402-20 , the House of Representatives passed my bipartisan Restoring Hope and Mental Health and Well-being Act to reverse the devastating mental health crisis made worse by government driven lockdowns. This bill was later signed into law by President Biden, and my hope is that it will build a brighter future for all.

It also includes legislation I wrote - the DEFEND Act - to combat the Iranian aggression that is threatening peace and security in the Middle East. This bill is proof that Congress will always come together to support our troops and strengthen our national defense against adversaries around the world.
He implemented the failed "catch and release" policy that practically opened our borders . He turned his back on border patrol agents who are stretched thin and suffering from low morale.

81 years ago , on December 7, 1941 - " a date which will live in infamy " - the course of history forever changed when the Japanese attacked Pearl Harbor. The United States was officially at war .
